descriptions.name: This is the name that will be displayed on your profile.
descriptions.email: This is the email that will be displayed on your profile.
descriptions.password: This is the password that will be used to log in to your account.
descriptions.confirm_password: This is the password that will be used to confirm your password.
descriptions.date_of_birth: This is the date of birth that will be displayed on your profile.
descriptions.language: This is the language that will be displayed on your profile.
descriptions.bio: This is the bio that will be displayed on your profile.
descriptions.username: This is the username that will be displayed on your profile.
descriptions.notifications: This is the notifications that will be used to notify you of new messages, events, etc.
descriptions.marketing: This is the marketing that will be used to send you marketing emails.
descriptions.social: This is the social that will be used to send you social emails.
descriptions.security: This is the security that will be used to send you security emails.
descriptions.font: This is the font that will be displayed on your profile.
descriptions.theme: This is the theme that will be displayed on your profile.
descriptions.select_language: This is the language that will be displayed on your profile.
descriptions.select_font: This is the font that will be displayed on your profile.
descriptions.select_theme: This is the theme that will be displayed on your profile.
